body:
HACKER'S YOUTUBE VIDEO HUB
[Avicus videos coming soon when I get back on my pc] 
#staymeme-ingful
In this thread I will show every single video I upload in some shape or form starting now, none of my old videos will be shown here. 

I will try to keep this thread as organised as possible! When a new upload does come I will be bumping the thread so you don't have to go around looking for it.

For easier access to my videos I highly suggest subscribing to my channel so Youtube updates you when I upload without you needing to check this thread constantly.

Oh and yes, I copied this from Tynvale, because I'm lazy af don't judge me

Oh and this is me trying to not be such a random 
Newest video:
<BROKEN MINITAGE>
https://youtu.be/6HcfLstY8gk (bad quality, I had to work with 3 clips because no one records against me and I'm on vacation without laptop right now so had to edit with my phone #gf) 

Social media:
I live under a fucking rock ok all I have is YouTube

hax trigger bot reported to the totally not ironic inspector tenebrous gg enjoy ban hax0r

replies.body: I don't jitter, I butterfly click to get 20cps so my hit detection is sketchy af + I beat a lot of known players and they accuse me or reach/smooth aimbot. look at the particles I get in some of my videos lol. I beat usmc, airflect, hackusation, djtasty a couple of times, smemoy and a few others and they all accused me since "it's impossible to get those hits with 300ms"

I beat usmc, airflect, hackusation, djtasty a couple of times, smemoy and a few others and they all accused me since "it's impossible to get those hits with 300ms"
